entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:09 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 02:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
